title: Hotel For Sale in Mirissa
details:
This ten bed roomed beach 3 storied Hotel is located on the beach & panoramic view , well away from the noisy main road and in front of the surfing & diving beach. The property is sold fully furnished and ready to be used as a rental investment. completed kitchen with more than 2 million kitchen equipments.
there are two restaurant . 8 bedrooms with AC & hot water
